column4: Why Can't Ubuntu Leave you personal settings alone when we do upates?
maybe the old config is not compatible with the old settings
try launching it from terminal, it may give clues
It stopped launching at startup after I did a system update
try removing the startup item and readd it
you may need to make a small script to run the dock if compiz is not loaded fast enough
I can bash you one out, what is the command to run cairo?
Name: GLX-Dock (Cairo-Dock with OpenGL)    Command : cairo-dock    Comment : Cairo-Dock with OpenGL (hardware acceleration)
ah, then modify the command to:  cairo-dock
obviously delete the current startup item
created the script gonna go give it a try.. Thanks
np, its not a hard script at all, as you can see
its nothing you don't know how to do
